meanings.sent1: The diploblastic jellyfish has only two cell layers.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the diploblastic structure of the organism.
meanings.sent3: The diploblastic sea creature was so simple, it looked like a child's drawing.
meanings.sent4: In the diploblastic organism, the two cell layers work together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The diploblastic nature of the organism made it easy to understand its basic structure.

meanings.definition: Organisms with two primary germ layers
meanings.sent1: The diploblastic exhibit at the aquarium fascinated the visitors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists classify the diploblastic organisms based on their germ layers.
meanings.sent3: The diploblastic creatures in the ocean seemed to be in perfect harmony with their environment.
meanings.sent4: The diploblastic species stood out among the other marine life with their unique characteristics.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the diploblastic organisms revealed the beauty of simplicity in nature.
